import React, { useState } from "react"; import "../../style/adminHome.css" const AdminHome = () => { const [isShowLike, setIsShowLike] = useState(false) return(

Welcome {localStorage.getItem("name")} to Admin Home

Have a good day!

Classify
Username
Title Event Create At

this is paragraph

this file upload

setIsShowLike(!isShowLike)} >
Like
Comments
User name

comment

) } export default AdminHome
